sn34.55:1.4.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ sātaccakārī hoti, na samādhismiṁ sappāyakārī.
sn34.55:1.4.en: One meditator is skilled in practicing persistently for immersion but not in doing what’s conducive to it.

sn34.55:1.5.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ sappāyakārī hoti, na samādhismiṁ sātaccakārī.
sn34.55:1.5.en: One meditator is skilled in doing what’s conducive to immersion but not in practicing persistently for it.

sn34.55:1.6.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṁ sātaccakārī hoti, na ca samādhismiṁ sappāyakārī.
sn34.55:1.6.en: One meditator is skilled neither in practicing persistently for immersion nor in doing what’s conducive to it.

sn34.55:1.7.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ sātaccakārī ca hoti, samādhismiṁ sappāyakārī ca.
sn34.55:1.7.en: One meditator is skilled both in practicing persistently for immersion and in doing what’s conducive to it.

sn34.55:1.8.pli: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ jhāyī samādhismiṁ sātaccakārī ca hoti samādhismiṁ sappāyakārī ca ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ jhāyīnaṁ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
sn34.55:1.8.en: Of these, the meditator skilled both in practicing persistently for immersion and in doing what’s conducive to it is the foremost, best, leading, highest, and finest of the four.

sn34.55:1.10.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ jhāyī samādhismiṁ sātaccakārī ca hoti, samādhismiṁ sappāyakārī ca ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ jhāyīnaṁ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro cā”ti.
sn34.55:1.10.en: In the same way, the meditator skilled both in practicing persistently for immersion and in doing what’s conducive to it is the foremost, best, leading, highest, and finest of the four.”

mlDocs.title:
Linked Discourses 34
1. Absorption
55. Persistence and What’s Conducive

sn34.10:1.4.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ sappāyakārī.
sn34.10:1.4.en: One meditator is skilled in immersion but not in doing what’s conducive to it. …”

1. Absorption
10. Conducive to Immersion
